text: The New Zealand national under-17 team also known as Young All Whites represents New Zealand in youth international football. They have been to the FIFA U-17 World Cup and they hosted the 1999 edition. ==Competition record== ===OFC U-17 Championship=== The OFC Under 17 Qualifying Tournament is a tournament held once every two years to decide the only two qualification spots for the Oceania Football Confederation (OFC) and its representatives at the FIFA U-17 World Cup. Since 2018 it has been renamed as the OFC U-16 Championship and held in the year preceding the U-17 World Cup.
